name: HACKERMAN: But he's Fired.
description:
You play as a Hacker who just got laid off, and you now have to get OFF THE GRID and INTO THE OUTSIDE WORLD. You are on a quest to find a job. But things have gone south,  and the hacker ends up in a struggle for his life.

Everything aside from two short sound effects and three google images was made entirely by one person! (meeeeeeeEEeeeEeEeeeeeeeEEEeeeEEEeeeE!)
